ygData.subject: Re: Suggested monk improvements
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/8/99 5:30:30 PM Eastern Daylight Time, mike@abso.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/8/99 5:30:30 PM Eastern Daylight Time, mike@...
writes:

<< Actually yes, that is quite possible... since the fact that ice comet takes
so long to cast, monks have plenty of time to pummel in a good 500-700 dmg,
which very easily could be more then half of the MoBs HP therefore giving
him the kill instead of the wizzie woh just just wasted a 900 mana spell...
>>

I don't know how often lvl 49 Wizards and 46 monks are fighting mobs with
1000-1400 hp's on your server, but in my exp, doesn't happen much.
When i party with my guild in lower guk, we often take two parties to do the
Ghoul Lord. We try to be somewhat egalitarian about the distribution of kills
between the two parties. So when one party is getting less kills, their
wizard will send out a few ice comets, and they get the kills -- monk or
melee classes in the other party seem quite irrelevant.
